name: Amanda's Magic Book 5: Hansel and Gretel
name_original: Amanda's Magic Book 5: Hansel and Gretel
description:
When Amanda is put in charge of watching her nephew Cedric for a few days, she expects a relaxing, enjoyable visit, but Cedric's boundless energy and dreams of heroism soon leave her exhausted. In an effort to settle him down, she convinces him to read a book with her - a fairy tale called "Hansel and Gretel."

But books have power, and their peaceful reading experience turns into unexpected peril when Amanda and Cedric are both pulled into the world of the book!

Within the book's pages, villagers live in fear as their children go missing, a witch in the forest hatches a terrifying plot, and a girl begins a desperate search for her vanished brother... Can Amanda and Cedric make sure this fairy tale still has a happy ending?


- Revisit the popular fairy tale with a new twist
- Exciting match-3 puzzles to gather the resources you need
- 5 chapters to follow her journey every step of the way
- Join Amanda and Cedric on in an adventure they never forget
- Exciting characters and story take the stage for this adventure
